p:
Post-stratification sampling weights were constructed using county-level U.S. Census estimates for race, Hispanic ethnicity, household income, educational attainment, and age group.
19 Multivariable ordered logistic regression analyses were conducted using Stata v.15.1 for each dependent variable. Multilevel mixed effects models were not used because of the small number of county- or state-level groups.
20 Instead, an indicator variable was used for county as a covariate. Predictors were selected from independent variables that demonstrated statistically significant associations with dependent variables in bivariate analyses. Stepwise analyses and Wald tests were used to determine model fit. All models controlled for county, age, and political party affiliation (“other covariates”).
